page.title: 07FLAMINGO PARK
page.content: Flamingo Park, situated between Puckpool and Seaview has{ample parking {space}for cars and coaches.The {entry {fee}is Â£1.40 for adults, Â£1.00 for children and Â£1.00 for Senior Citizens. It is estimated there were about 100,000 visitors in 1984. The Park consists mainly of{water {birds,}and there are ponds, lakes and waterfalls to form a natural habitat. However, there is a variety of other birds, such as {macaws, flamingoes}and {peacocks.}The birds are kept in open enclosures, cages or allowed free flight.The{pheasants}are particularily interesting, forming part of a preservation plan.{Unwanted offspring are sold to other parks, swapped for wanted species, or released into the wild. There is{a cafeteria and gift {shop. Toilets}cater for the disabled as well as other visitors.
